casebody.data:
Frank MAZZARA, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. U. S. GYPSUM COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 18. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 9, 1942. William L. Clay, of Rochester, N. Y., for plaintiff-appellant. Casper Baltensperger and Goodwin, Nixon, Hargrave, Middleton & Devans, all of Rochester, N. Y., and Scott, MacLeish & Falk, of Chicago, Ill. (Wendell J. Brown, of Chicago, Ill., of counsel), for defendantappellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open Court.
